Based on the provided card list and my knowledge of the card scoring system, I will create a new list reflecting my confidence in the cards. 

The cards with the highest scores are:
- ♦9 (D9) from Tier C (+3.0)
- Other red cards like ♥6 (H6), ♥7 (H7), and ♥9 (H9) will have a baseline score of +0.4.
- The black cards (♠ and ♣) have lower scores, with the highest being +0.2 for the cards in the list.

Given this, my final list will prioritize D9, followed by the other red cards for variety, and include some of the black cards as well.
